items.name: Trailblazer Mountain Bike
items.description: Perfect for rugged trails and off-road adventures. Lightweight aluminum frame with shock absorbers.

items.name: Speedster Road Bike
items.description: Built for speed on paved roads. Sleek design with aerodynamic handlebars and narrow tires.

items.name: Urban Commuter Bike
items.description: Ideal for city travel and everyday commuting. Includes luggage rack and comfortable saddle.

items.name: Aluminum Frame 27.5
items.description: Durable yet lightweight frame suitable for mountain bikes with 27.5-inch wheels.

items.name: Carbon Frame 29
items.description: High-performance carbon fiber frame for serious riders using 29-inch wheels.

items.name: Steel Frame Classic
items.description: Classic and sturdy steel frame ideal for vintage bike builds.

items.name: Cycling Helmet
items.description: Standard lightweight helmet for everyday riding. Adjustable straps and ventilation holes.

items.name: Knee & Elbow Pads
items.description: Comfortable and durable pads to protect joints during rides or falls.

items.name: Full Face Helmet
items.description: Provides full facial protection for downhill or extreme riding. Includes chin guard.
